ml_app package¶

Submodules¶

ml_app.inference module¶

ml_app.inference.main()[source]¶

Main function for running inference using the pre-trained model.

This function retrieves data from an environment variable, performs inference using the trained model, and saves the output (predictions) to a JSON file.

ml_app.train module¶

class ml_app.train.Model(test_size=0.5)[source]¶

Bases: object

A KNN model for classifying the Iris dataset.

This class initializes, trains, and evaluates a K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN) model on the Iris dataset. It also provides an inference function for making predictions on new data.

dataset¶

The dataset used (‘iris’).

Type:

str

architecture¶

The model architecture (‘KNN’).

Type:

str

eval¶

The evaluation score (accuracy) of the trained model.

Type:

float

Module contents¶

dsan-6700-assignment-1
